alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Laurel; Lee; Owsley; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Laurel, Owsley, Jackson, east central Rockcastle, southwestern Lee and northern Clay Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shop Branch, or near McKee, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bradshaw, Atkinstown, Gray Hawk, Macedonia, Mildred, Settle Store, Welchburg and Foxtown around 535 PM EDT. Privett, Turkey Foot, Mummie, Herd, Zekes Point, Tyner, Lakes, Wind Cave and Egypt around 540 PM EDT. Green Hall, New Zion, Elian, Nathanton, Maulden, Arvel, Old Orchard and Sourwood around 545 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Travellers Rest, Vincent, Sturgeon, Endee, Wild Dog, Delvinta, Earnestville, Banford, Blake, Cressmont, Scoville, Levi, Pebworth, Major, Ida May, Caryton, Conkling, White Ash, Heidelberg, Belle Point, Booneville, Chestnut Gap, Turin, Stay, Eversole, Lerose, Grass, Lower Buffalo, Cowcreek and Southfork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central, southeastern and east central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Jackson; Laurel; Lee; Owsley; Rockcastle
